content: hey everybody you can see here I have a little mouse of die Raman let me give
you a closer look you pick it up here okay you can see I have the three
mouseling adventures on there I got a warrior a wizard and a ranger and those
are seeds into the base so the base is made out of sculpey and I put spaces
that the figures could fit on to the base so that worked out really well for
that now the knot the cave is actually a tree
not that I found and incorporated into the base so the base is sculpey and the
tree the tree not is an actual tree not you can see I added some roots there I
added some little plants here and those are from the bristles of a brush I just
panned those green and cut them off and then stuck him into the sculpey I can
also flocked it so you can see that kind of moss on there that gives a nice
effect the little sign here says Danger Mouse stirs so I thought that was a cute
little thing for the mice and there we go so that's a fun little mouseling
diorama that I made and I'll see you next time on my crafting
